name: PatientReasonForACEInhibitorOrARBDecline
title: Patient Reason for ACE Inhibitor or ARB Decline
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a patient reason for declining angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor or angiotensin ii receptor blocker (ARB) therapy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Communication, or may be used as an attribute.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with patient reason declining ACE inhibitor or ARB therapy.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
